title: Game Progress Route
content:
thoughts of its contents. You will get two options to respond:

You're familiar with the subject matter? Oh yes, I loved it. Especially the part about the unicorns.

If you choose the first one, he will suspect that you are not familiar with it and will try to turn you away and will suggest that you return to the domain of the living. You will get the next choices:

Is there anything I can do for you? Have you anything to trade? Leave.

If you choose the first one, Mystic Carrion will consider
